content:
TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion Enum

Definition

Specifies the version of the .NET Framework to use with the methods in ToolLocationHelper.

In this Article

public enum TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion

Fields

Version11

Specifies .NET Framework version 1.1.
Version20

Specifies .NET Framework version 2.0.
Version30

Specifies .NET Framework version 3.0.
Version35

Specifies .NET Framework version 3.5.
Version40

version 4.0
Version45

version 4.5
VersionLatest

Specifies the most recent released version of the .NET Framework.
